about_the_game:
OFFICE MANAGEMENT


Style your office to be a beautiful and productive working environment. Place your products where you want them to be and design a seamless experience for your orders.

SUPPLY GOODS



Order items using the in-game computer. Place the goods on the shelves, organize them in your office and put them on sale in your online store.

ON SALE


Determine the value of the product correctly and ensure that customer comments remain positive.

SHIPPED



Ship the purchased products and deliver them to the cargo vehicle to reach the customers.

PROLOGUE

Contents such as hiring workers, boxing tables, computers, opening new shops and warehouses are not available in this prologue. If you liked this prologue, which focuses on the extensive gameplay of the game's ordering and shipping mechanics, you can add it to your wish list by going to the full version page within the game.

name: E-Trading Simulator: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In this free version of our game, turn your e-commerce business, which you started in a small office, into a huge online e-trading network. Order new products, set product prices, carefully box incoming orders, prepare the boxes and deliver them to the cargo vehicle.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
